str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From blasphemos; to vilify; specially, to speak impiously.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
A sending away, a letting go, a release, pardon, complete forgiveness. From aphiemi; freedom; pardon.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Involved in, held in, hence: liable, generally with dat. (or gen.) of the punishment. From enecho; liable to.
A fault, sin, evil deed. From hamartano; a sin.
